00040 SVG::Attribute::Attribute(const string& inName, const string& inValue) 
00041 : pair<string, string>(inName, inValue) 
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00046 SVG::Style SVG::Attribute::operator+(const SVG::Attribute& inAttribute) const
00047 {
00048     return Style(*this) += inAttribute;
00049 }
00050 
00052 SVG::Style SVG::Attribute::operator+(const SVG::Style& inAttrList) const
00053 {
00054     return Style(*this) += inAttrList;
00055 }

00065 const SVG::Attribute SVG::fillColor(const SVG::Color& inColor) 
00066 {
00067     return Attribute("fill", inColor);
00068 }
00069 
00077 const SVG::Attribute SVG::fillOpacity(double inValue) 
00078 {
00079     PACC_AssertM(inValue >= 0 && inValue <= 1, "Invalid opacity value!");
00080     return Attribute("fill-opacity", String::convert(inValue));
00081 }
00082 
00111 const SVG::Attribute SVG::fillRule(SVG::RuleType inType) 
00112 {
00113     string lValue;
00114     switch(inType) {
00115         case eNonZero: lValue = "nonzero";
00116         case eEvenOdd: lValue = "evenodd";
00117     }
00118     PACC_AssertM(!lValue.empty(), "Invalid fill rule type!");
00119     return Attribute("fill-rule",lValue);
00120 }

00155 const SVG::Attribute SVG::fontStyle(SVG::FontType inType)
00156 {
00157     string lName, lValue;
00158     switch(inType) {
00159         case eBold: lName = "font-weight"; lValue = "bold"; break;
00160         case eItalic: lName = "font-style"; lValue = "italic"; break;
00161         case eOblique: lName = "font-style"; lValue = "oblique"; break;
00162         case eUnderline: lName = "text-decoration"; lValue = "underline"; break;
00163         case eStrike: lName = "text-decoration"; lValue = "line-through"; break;
00164     }
00165     PACC_AssertM(!lName.empty() && !lValue.empty(), "Invalid font style type!");
00166     return Attribute(lName,lValue);
00167 }

00187     PACC_AssertM(inValue >= 0 && inValue <= 1, "Invalid opacity value!");
00188     return Attribute("opacity", String::convert(inValue));

00214 const SVG::Attribute SVG::strokeDash(const string& inDash)

00228 const SVG::Attribute SVG::strokeDash(const vector<double>& inDash) 
00229 {
00230     string lValue;
00231     for(int i = 0; i < inDash.size(); ++i) {
00232         lValue += String::convert(inDash[i]) + " ";
00233     }
00234     PACC_AssertM(!lValue.empty(), "Invalid dash vector!");
00235     return strokeDash(lValue);
00236 }
00237 
00247 const SVG::Attribute SVG::strokeDash(SVG::DashType inType) 
00248 {
00249     string lValue;
00250     switch(inType) {
00251         case eContinuous: lValue = "none";
00252         case eDashed: lValue = "5 4";
00253         case eDotted: lValue = "1 2";
00254     }           
00255     PACC_AssertM(!lValue.empty(), "Invalid dash  type!");
00256     return Attribute("stroke-dasharray",lValue);
00257 }

00268 const SVG::Attribute SVG::strokeLineCap(SVG::CapType inType)
00269 {
00270     string lValue;
00271     switch(inType) {
00272         case eButt: lValue = "butt"; break;
00273         case eRoundCap: lValue = "round"; break;
00274         case eSquare: lValue = "square"; break;
00275     }
00276     PACC_AssertM(!lValue.empty(), "Invalid stroke linecap type!");
00277     return Attribute("stroke-linecap",lValue);
00278 }

00289 const SVG::Attribute SVG::strokeLineJoin(SVG::JoinType inType) 
00290 {
00291     string lValue;
00292     switch(inType) {
00293         case eMiter: lValue = "miter"; break;
00294         case eRoundJoin: lValue = "round"; break;
00295         case eBevel: lValue = "bevel"; break;
00296     }           
00297     PACC_AssertM(!lValue.empty(), "Invalid stroke linejoin type!");
00298     return Attribute("stroke-linejoin",lValue);
00299 }

00342 const SVG::Attribute SVG::textAnchor(SVG::AnchorType inType)
00343 {
00344     string lValue;
00345     switch(inType) {
00346         case eStart: lValue = "start"; break;
00347         case eMiddle: lValue = "middle"; break;
00348         case eEnd: lValue = "end"; break;
00349     }
00350     PACC_AssertM(!lValue.empty(), "Invalid text anchor type!");
00351     return Attribute("text-anchor",lValue);
00352 }

00363 const SVG::Attribute SVG::textBaseline(SVG::BaselineType inType)
00364 {
00365     string lValue;
00366     switch(inType) {
00367         case eAlpha: lValue = "alphabetical"; break;
00368         case eBottom: lValue = "text-after-edge"; break;
00369         case eCentral: lValue = "central"; break;
00370         case eTop: lValue = "hanging"; break;
00371     }
00372     PACC_AssertM(!lValue.empty(), "Invalid text baseline type!");
00373     return Attribute("dominant-baseline",lValue);
00374 }
